anya-e0809n1:12: Jino, sakko tu siddhattho, suddhodani ca gotamo.
anya-e0809n1:14: Sakyasīho tathā sakya, muni cādiccabandhu ca;
anya-e0809n1:16: Mokkho nirodho nibbānaṁ, dīpo taṇhakkhayo paraṁ;
anya-e0809n1:17: Tāṇaṁ leṇa marūpañca, santaṁ sacca manālayaṁ.
anya-e0809n1:24: Dukkhakkhayo byābajjhañca byāpajjaṁ (ṭīkā), vivaṭṭaṁ khema kevalaṁ;
anya-e0809n1:25: Apavaggo virāgo ca, paṇīta maccutaṁ padaṁ.
anya-e0809n1:27: Yogakkhemo pāra mapi, mutti santi visuddhiyo;
anya-e0809n1:30: Khīṇāsavo tva’sekkho ca, vītarāgo tathā’ rahā;
anya-e0809n1:34: Tidasā tva’marā devā, vibudhā ca sudhāsino;
anya-e0809n1:35: Surā marū divokā cā, matapā saggavāsino.
anya-e0809n1:37: Nijjarā’ nimisā dibbā, apume devatāni ca devatā eva devatāni, sakatthe nipaccayo (ṭīkā);
anya-e0809n1:39: Siddho bhūto ca gandhabbo, guyhako yakkha rakkhasā;
anya-e0809n1:48: Vāsudevo hari harī (ṭīkā) kaṇho, kesavo cakkapāṇya’tha;
anya-e0809n1:51: Haro vutto kumāro tu, khandho sattidharo bhave;
anya-e0809n1:53: Sakko purindado deva, rājā vajirapāṇi ca;
anya-e0809n1:57: Suranātho ca vajira, hattho ca bhūtapatya’pi.
anya-e0809n1:60: Viḍojo tha sujā tassa sujātā’ssa (ṭīkā), bhariyā tha puraṁ bhave.
anya-e0809n1:62: Masakkasārā masakkasāro (sī.) vassoka, sārā cevā’ marāvatī;
anya-e0809n1:68: Erāvaṇo gajo paṇḍu, kambalo tu silāsanaṁ.
anya-e0809n1:71: Nandanaṁ missakaṁ citta, latā phārusakaṁ vanā.
anya-e0809n1:77: Vimāno nitthiyaṁ byamhaṁ, pīyūsaṁ tvamataṁ sudhā;
anya-e0809n1:78: Sineru meru tidivā, dhāro neru sumeru ca.
anya-e0809n1:86: Kapparukkho tu santānā, dayo devaddumā siyuṁ.
anya-e0809n1:88: Pācī patījhu’ dīci’tthī, pubba pacchima uttarā;
anya-e0809n1:91: Erāvato erāvaṇo (sī.), amarakose pana erāvato eva atthi puṇḍarīko, vāmano kumudo’ ñjano;
anya-e0809n1:94: Dhataraṭṭho ca gandhabbā, dhipo, kumbhaṇḍasāmi tu;
anya-e0809n1:101: Jātavedo sikhī joti, pāvako dahano’ nalo;
anya-e0809n1:102: Hutāvaho’ ccimā dhūma, ketva’ggi gini bhānumā.
anya-e0809n1:104: Tejo dhūmasikho vāyu, sakho ca kaṇhavattanī;
anya-e0809n1:107: Vipphuliṅgaṁ phuliṅgañca, bhasmā ‘bhasmā’ tipadaṁ rājādigaṇe pariyāpannaṁ (rūpasiddhi-uṇādi), bhasmaṁ (sī.) tu seṭṭhi chārikā;
anya-e0809n1:109: Kukkuḷo tu’ṇhabhasmasmi, maṅgāro’lāta mummukaṁ tikaṁ dittakaṭṭhādindhane (ṭīkā);
anya-e0809n1:115: Gandhavāho tathā vāyo, samīro ca sadāgati.
anya-e0809n1:117: Vāyubhedā ime chu’ddha, ṅgamo cādhogamo tathā;
anya-e0809n1:123: Vego javo rayo khippaṁ, tu sīghaṁ turitaṁ lahu;
anya-e0809n1:124: Āsu tuṇṇa maraṁ cāvi, lambitaṁ tuvaṭaṁpi ca.
anya-e0809n1:126: Satataṁ nicca maviratā, nārata santata manavaratañca dhuvaṁ;
anya-e0809n1:127: Bhusa matisayo ca daḷhaṁ, tibbe’kantā’timatta, bāḷhāni;
anya-e0809n1:128: Khippādī paṇḍake dabbe, dabbagā tesu ye tisu.
anya-e0809n1:130: Aviggaho tu kāmo ca, manobhū madano bhave;
anya-e0809n1:131: Antako vasavattī ca, pāpimā ca pajāpati.
anya-e0809n1:133: Pamattabandhu kaṇho ca, māro namuci, tassa tu;
anya-e0809n1:134: Taṇhā’ratī ragā dhītū, hatthī tu girimekhalo.
anya-e0809n1:137: Vepacitti pulomo ca, kimpuriso tu kinnaro.
anya-e0809n1:148: Abbhaṁ tīsvatha vassañca, vassanaṁ vuṭṭhi nāriyaṁ;
anya-e0809n1:151: Meghanāde tu dhanitaṁ, gajjitaṁ rasitādi ca;
anya-e0809n1:159: Indu cando ca nakkhatta, rājā somo nisākaro.
anya-e0809n1:162: Sītaraṁsi nisānātho, uḷurājā ca mā pume.
anya-e0809n1:164: Kalā soḷasamo bhāgo, bimbaṁ tu maṇḍalaṁ bhave;
anya-e0809n1:165: Aḍḍho tvaddho upaḍḍho ca, vā khaṇḍaṁ sakalaṁ pume.
anya-e0809n1:167: Addhaṁ vuttaṁ same bhāge, pasādo tu pasannatā;
anya-e0809n1:168: Komudī candikā juṇhā, kanti sobhā juti cchavi.
anya-e0809n1:171: Cihanaṁ cāpi sobhā tu, paramā susamā tha ca.
anya-e0809n1:173: Sītaṁ guṇe, guṇiliṅgā, sīta sisira sītalā;
anya-e0809n1:174: Himaṁ tuhina mussāvo, nīhāro mahikā pyatha.
anya-e0809n1:176: Nakkhattaṁ joti bhaṁ tārā, apume tārako’ḷu ca;
anya-e0809n1:179: Migasira magasira (sī.) maddā ca punabbasu, phusso pusso (ṭī.) cāsilesa’pi.
anya-e0809n1:181: Māghā magha (sī.) ca phaggunī dve ca, hatthā cittā ca svātipi;
anya-e0809n1:182: Visākhā’ nurādhā jeṭṭhā, mūlā’ sāḷhā duve tathā.
anya-e0809n1:184: Savaṇo ca dhaniṭṭhā ca, satabhisajo pubbu’ttarabhaddapadā;
anya-e0809n1:187: Sobbhānu kathito rāhu, sūrādī tu navaggahā;
anya-e0809n1:188: Rāsi mesādiko bhadda, padā poṭṭhapadā samā.
anya-e0809n1:194: Raṁsimā bhākaro bhānu, akko sahassaraṁsi ca.
anya-e0809n1:196: Raṁsi ābhā pabhā ditti, ruci bhā juti dīdhiti;
anya-e0809n1:197: Marīci dvīsu bhānvaṁ’su, mayūkho kiraṇo karo.
anya-e0809n1:209: Dasa khaṇamuhutto te, divaso tu ahaṁ dinaṁ.
anya-e0809n1:215: Nisā ca rajanī ratti, tiyāmā saṁvarī bhave;
anya-e0809n1:219: Andhakāro tamo nitthī, timisaṁ timiraṁ mataṁ.
anya-e0809n1:222: Vanasaṇḍo ghano megha, paṭalaṁ cā’ḍḍharatti ca.
anya-e0809n1:225: Pāṭipado tu dutiyā, tatiyādī tithītithi, tāyati pāletīti tithi, tā+iti (ṇvādi) dvisu.
anya-e0809n1:230: Ghaṭikā saṭṭhya’ horatto, pakkho te dasa pañca ca;
anya-e0809n1:234: Citto vesākha, jeṭṭho cā, sāḷho dvīsu ca sāvaṇo;
anya-e0809n1:237: Māgasiro tathā phusso, kamena māgha phagguṇā;
anya-e0809n1:244: Kamā hemanta gimhāna, vassānā utuyo dvisu.
anya-e0809n1:247: Cha vā vasanto ca gimha vassānā;
anya-e0809n1:248: Saradoti kamā māsā, dve dve vuttānusārena.
anya-e0809n1:255: Vassa saṁvaccharā nitthī, sarado hāyano samā.
anya-e0809n1:257: Kappakkhayo tu saṁvaṭṭo, yuganta palayā api;
anya-e0809n1:262: Pāpañca kibbisaṁ verā, ghaṁ duccarita dukkaṭaṁ;
anya-e0809n1:265: Kusalaṁ sukataṁ sukkaṁ, puññaṁ dhamma manitthiyaṁ;
anya-e0809n1:272: Hāso’ ttamanatā pīti, vitti tuṭṭhi ca nāriyaṁ;
anya-e0809n1:275: Pāmojjañca pamodo tha, sukhaṁ sātañca phāsva’tha;
anya-e0809n1:276: Bhaddaṁ seyyo subhaṁ khemaṁ, kalyāṇaṁ maṅgalaṁ sivaṁ.
anya-e0809n1:278: Dukkhañca kasiraṁ kicchaṁ, nīgho ca byasanaṁ aghaṁ;
anya-e0809n1:279: Dabbe tu pāpapuññāni, tīsvākicchaṁ sukhādi ca.
anya-e0809n1:281: Bhāgyaṁ niyati bhāgo ca, bhāgadheyyaṁ vidhī’rito;
anya-e0809n1:282: Atho uppatti nibbatti, jāti janana mubbhavo.
anya-e0809n1:284: Nimittaṁ kāraṇaṁ ṭhānaṁ, padaṁ bījaṁ nibandhanaṁ;
anya-e0809n1:285: Nidānaṁ pabhavo hetu, sambhavo setu paccayo.
anya-e0809n1:287: Kāraṇaṁ yaṁ samāsannaṁ, padaṭṭhānanti taṁ mataṁ;
anya-e0809n1:288: Jīvo tu puriso’ttā tha, padhānaṁ pakatitthiyaṁ.
anya-e0809n1:290: Pāṇo sarīrī bhūtaṁ vā, satto dehī ca puggalo;
anya-e0809n1:294: Rūpaṁ saddo gandha rasā, phasso dhammo ca gocarā;
anya-e0809n1:295: Ālambā visayā te chā, rammaṇā lambaṇāni ca.
anya-e0809n1:311: Kaḷāro kapilo nīla, pīte tha rocanappabhe;
anya-e0809n1:312: Piṅgo pisaṅgo pyathavā, kaḷārādī tu piṅgale.
anya-e0809n1:318: Naccaṁ naṭṭañca naṭanaṁ, nattanaṁ lāsanaṁ bhave;
anya-e0809n1:319: Naccaṁ tu vāditaṁ gīta, miti nāṭumidaṁ tayaṁ.
anya-e0809n1:324: Siṅgāro karuṇo vīra, bbhuta hassa bhayānakā;
anya-e0809n1:325: Santo bībhaccha ruddāni, nava nāṭyarasā ime.
anya-e0809n1:327: Posassa nāriyaṁ pose, itthiyā saṅgamaṁ pati;
anya-e0809n1:334: Bhāsitaṁ lapitaṁ bhāsā, vohāro vacanaṁ vaco;
anya-e0809n1:335: Utti vācā girā vāṇī, bhāratī kathitā kathā (katthaci) vacī.
anya-e0809n1:341: Hāse soke pasāde ca, kare āmeḍitaṁ budho.
anya-e0809n1:343: Iru nārī yaju sāma, miti vedā tayo siyuṁ;
anya-e0809n1:344: Ete eva tayī nārī, vedo manto sutitthiyaṁ.
anya-e0809n1:346: Aṭṭhako vāmako vāma, devo caṅgīraso bhagu;
anya-e0809n1:347: Yamadaggi ca vāsiṭṭho, bhāradvājo ca kassapo;
anya-e0809n1:350: Kappo byākaraṇaṁ joti, satthaṁ sikkhā nirutti ca;
anya-e0809n1:356: Vitaṇḍasatthaṁ viññeyyaṁ, yaṁ taṁ lokāyataṁ iti;
anya-e0809n1:357: Keṭubhaṁ tu kriyākappa, vikappo kavinaṁ hito.
anya-e0809n1:362: Saññā, khyā, vhā samaññā cā, bhidhānaṁ nāma mavhayo;
anya-e0809n1:365: Pañho tīsva nuyogo ca, pucchā pyatha nidassanaṁ;
anya-e0809n1:368: Samā saṅkhepa saṁhārā, samāso saṅgaho pyatha;
anya-e0809n1:371: Vohāro tu vivādo tha, sapanaṁ sapathopi ca;
anya-e0809n1:376: Katthanā ca silāghā ca, vaṇṇanā ca nuti tthuti.
anya-e0809n1:378: Thomanañca thomanaṁ vā (katthaci thomanaṁ thomanā dviliṅge) pasaṁsātha, kekā nādo sikhaṇḍinaṁ;
anya-e0809n1:382: Pariyāyo vevacanaṁ, sākacchā tu ca saṁkathā;
anya-e0809n1:386: Khepo nindā tathā kucchā, jigucchā garahā bhave;
anya-e0809n1:403: Vitathaṁ tu musā cātha āhataṁ tu musātthakaṁ (katthaci, amarakose), pharusādī tiliṅgikā.
anya-e0809n1:405: Sammā byayañcā vitathaṁ, saccaṁ tacchaṁ yathātathaṁ;
anya-e0809n1:406: Tabbantā tīsva līkaṁ tva, saccaṁ micchā musā byayaṁ.
anya-e0809n1:414: Bindu gambhīra ninnādī, tyeva maṭṭhaṅgiko saro.
anya-e0809n1:420: Sarā satta tayo gāmā, cekavīsati mucchanā;
anya-e0809n1:423: Usabho dhevato ceva, chajja gandhāra majjhimā;
anya-e0809n1:424: Pañcamo ca nisādoti, satte’te gaditā sarā.
anya-e0809n1:426: Nadanti usabhaṁ gāvo, turagā dhevataṁ tathā;
anya-e0809n1:427: Chajjaṁ mayūrā gandhāra, majā koñcā ca majjhimaṁ.
anya-e0809n1:433: Saresu tesu pacceke, tisso tisso hi mucchanā;
anya-e0809n1:434: Siyuṁ tatheva tānāni ṭhānāni (bahūsu), satta satteva labbhare.
anya-e0809n1:436: Tisso duve catasso ca, catasso kamato sare;
anya-e0809n1:437: Tisso duve catassoti, dvāvīsati sutī siyuṁ.
anya-e0809n1:439: Uccatare rave tāro, thābyatte madhure kalo;
anya-e0809n1:440: Gambhīre tu rave mando, tārādī tīsvatho kale;
anya-e0809n1:444: Vīṇā ca vallakī satta, tantī sā parivādinī;
anya-e0809n1:458: Ātojjaṁ tu ca vādittaṁ, vāditaṁ vajja muccate.
anya-e0809n1:469: So tvā modo dūragāmī, vissantā tīsvito paraṁ.
anya-e0809n1:471: Iṭṭhagandho ca surabhi, sugandho ca sugandhi ca;
anya-e0809n1:472: Pūtigandhi tu duggandho, tha vissaṁ āmagandhi yaṁ.
anya-e0809n1:477: Kasāvo nitthiyaṁ titto, madhuro lavaṇo ime;
anya-e0809n1:478: Ambilo kaṭuko ceti, cha rasā tabbatī tisu.
anya-e0809n1:482: Nayanaṁ tvakkhi nettañca, locanaṁ ca’cchi cakkhu ca.
anya-e0809n1:484: Sotaṁ saddaggaho kaṇṇo, savanaṁ suti natthu tu;
anya-e0809n1:485: Nāsā ca nāsikā ghānaṁ, jivhātu rasanā bhave.
anya-e0809n1:487: Sarīraṁ vapu gattañcā, ttabhāvo bondi viggaho;
anya-e0809n1:488: Dehaṁ vā purise kāyo, thiyaṁ tanu kaḷevaraṁ.
anya-e0809n1:490: Cittaṁ ceto mano nitthī, viññāṇaṁ hadayaṁ tathā;
anya-e0809n1:491: Mānasaṁ dhī tu paññā ca, buddhi medhā mati muti.
anya-e0809n1:493: Bhūrī mantā ca paññāṇaṁ, ñāṇaṁ vijjā ca yoni ca;
anya-e0809n1:497: Sampajaññaṁ tu nepakkaṁ, vedayitaṁ tu vedanā.
anya-e0809n1:501: Ekaggatā tu samatho, avikkhepo samādhi ca.
anya-e0809n1:503: Ussāhā’ tappa paggāhā, vāyāmo ca parakkamo;
anya-e0809n1:504: Padhānaṁ vīriyaṁ cehā, uyyāmo ca dhiti tthiyaṁ.
anya-e0809n1:509: Ussoḷhī tva dhimattehā, sati tva nussati tthiya;
anya-e0809n1:510: Lajjā hirī samānā tha, ottappaṁ pāpabhīrutā.
anya-e0809n1:516: Dayā’ nukampā kāruññaṁ, karuṇā ca anuddayā;
anya-e0809n1:517: Thiyaṁ veramaṇī ceva, viratyā’ rati cāpyatha.
anya-e0809n1:519: Titikkhā khanti khamanaṁ, khamā mettā tu metya’tha;
anya-e0809n1:520: Dassanaṁ diṭṭhi laddhitthī, siddhanto samayo bhave.
anya-e0809n1:522: Taṇhā ca tasiṇā ejā, jālinī ca visattikā;
anya-e0809n1:523: Chando jaṭā nikantyā’sā, sibbinī bhavanetti ca.
anya-e0809n1:525: Abhijjhā vanatho vānaṁ, lobho rāgo ca ālayo;
anya-e0809n1:526: Pihā manoratho icchā, bhilāso kāma dohaḷā;
anya-e0809n1:527: Ākaṅkhā ruci vuttā sā, tvadhikā lālasā dvisu.
anya-e0809n1:529: Veraṁ virodho viddeso, doso ca paṭighañca vā;
anya-e0809n1:533: Baddhavera mupanāho, siyā soko tu socanaṁ;
anya-e0809n1:536: Bhītitthi bhaya muttāso, bheravaṁ tu mahabbhayaṁ;
anya-e0809n1:539: Ghoraṁ paṭibhayaṁ bhesmaṁ, bhayaṅkara mime tīsu.
anya-e0809n1:541: Issā usūyā maccheraṁ, tu macchariya maccharaṁ;
anya-e0809n1:542: Moho’vijjā tathā’ñāṇaṁ, māno vidhā ca unnati.
anya-e0809n1:544: Uddhacca muddhaṭaṁ cātha uddhavaṁuddhaṁ dhāvati citta metenāti uddhavaṁ (ṭīkā), tāpo kukkuccameva ca;
anya-e0809n1:548: Dveḷhakaṁ vicikicchā ca, kaṅkhā saṅkā vimatyapi.
anya-e0809n1:551: Nicchayo niṇṇayo vutto, paṭiññā tu paṭissavo.
anya-e0809n1:554: Parābhavo pya’ vaññā tha, ummādo cittavibbhamo.
anya-e0809n1:556: Pemaṁ sineho sneho tha, cittapīḷā visaññitā;
anya-e0809n1:559: Vilāso lalitaṁ līlā, hāvo heḷā ca vibbhamo;
anya-e0809n1:562: Hasanaṁ hasitaṁ hāso, mando so mihitaṁ sitaṁ;
anya-e0809n1:566: Parihāso davo khiḍḍā, keḷi kīḷā ca kīḷitaṁ;
anya-e0809n1:567: Niddā tu supinaṁ soppaṁ, middhañca pacalāyikā.
anya-e0809n1:569: Thiyaṁ nikati kūṭañca, dambho sāṭhyañca ketavaṁ;
anya-e0809n1:570: Sabhāvo tu nissaggo ca, sarūpaṁ pakatitthiyaṁ.
